text: Pep Boys is an American automotive aftermarket service chain. It was founded in 1921. It is headquartered in the Philadelphia suburb of Bala Cynwyd, Pennsylvania. It provides name-brand tires, automotive maintenance and repair, and fleet maintenance and repair to customers across the United States. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:Automobiles Category:1921 establishments in the United States Category:1920s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Pep Boys
